meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carl Bradshaw Cecilia Boudreau Kate Rowland Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6099.

td.p: Carl Bradshaw, a financial manager from St. Louis, Missouri
Cecilia Boudreau, a lawyer for a nonprofit from Washington, D.C.
Kate Rowland, a family doctor from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,401)

tr.td: STATE NICKNAMES
ALPHABET ROCKERS
SPECIAL MONTHS
THE INSTRUMENT OF DEATH
WHAT A NICE PAIR!
"TIME"LY WORDS
